title: Idle World Miner Tycoon
description: Idle World Miner Tycoon is an idle clicker game where your mission is to obliterate entire planets, extracting valuable resources. Enhance your pickaxe to delve deeper and uncover more precious ores. Smelt your findings to acquire diverse materials for superior shop upgrades. Watch the quarry work for you during idle moments and unravel the mystery hidden at the planet's core. Dive into a cosmic mining adventure!
